query:
SELECT
            COUNT(*) as "total!: i64",
            SUM(CASE WHEN state = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "new!: i64",
            SUM(CASE WHEN state IN (1, 3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "learning!: i64",
            SUM(CASE WHEN state = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "review!: i64"
        FROM flashcards
        WHERE text_id = ?
